operations.notes: Requests Station data for all Stations in the system

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description:
Provides extra detail for some of the fields.
Value: [detail]

responseMessages.message: Success. See the 'Response Class' section above for the description of the data.
Insufficient authorization. Basic Authentication is missing, invalid, or permissions are insufficient for the operation.

operations.notes: Requests Station data for the station identified by the IP Address

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description:
Provides extra detail for some of the fields.
Value: [detail]

responseMessages.message: Success. See the 'Response Class' section above for the description of the data.
Bad Request. Typically invalid or incomplete parameter(s). See the 'message' property for detail of the error.
Insufficient authorization. Basic Authentication is missing, invalid, or permissions are insufficient for the operation.

links.description:
*method=GET*Provides link relations as URLs using the REST 'hateoas' convention (for REST delivered data).
    The 'rel/camera' link references the associated camera and can be used to access further information via the REST Cameras Endpoint

reportedTime.description: Last reported time of the Camera Server. Available with expand=detail

isServerOffline.description: Specifies if the the Camera server is offline. Presented only if camera server is offline

isPowerOn.description: Specifies whether the Camera power is on

position.description: Position of the Camera. Available with expand=detail

reportedTime.description: Last reported time of the Display Station. Available with expand=detail

count.description: Running sequence counter of heartbeat messages received for the Display Station. Available with expand=detail

url.description: URL resulting in this error message

links.description:
*method=GET*Provides link relations as URLs using the REST 'hateoas' convention (for REST delivered data).
    The 'self' link references this rest object, including any specified query criteria

items.description: An array of Stations matching the query criteria

totalItems.description: Total number of elements matching the query filter and not limited by page size

primary.description: Provides the primary controller of this service as an IP address

secondary.description: Provides the secondary controller (if any) of this service as an IP address

reportedTime.description: Last reported time from the Station. Available with expand=detail

rpNum.description: Radar Processing Number. Used for identification of the Radar

count.description: Running sequence counter of heartbeat messages received for the RP Station. Available with expand=detail

position.description: Location of the Station. Available with expand=detail

links.description:
*method=GET*Provides link relations as URLs using the REST 'hateoas' convention (for REST delivered data).
    The 'rel/radar' link references the associated Radar and can be used to access further information via the REST Radar (or RadarImage) Endpoint

controllers.description: The controllers of this service. Available with expand=detail

radarUsageTime.description: Information on time of Radar Activity. Available with expand=detail

isActive.description: Specifies whether the service is active

reportedTime.description: Most recent reported time of the Camera Station

cameraServices.description: Further information for each Camera managed

isActive.description: Specifies whether the service is active or not

controller.description: Provides the controller of this service as an IP address. Available with expand=detail

links.description:
*method=GET*Provides link relations as URLs using the REST 'hateoas' convention (for REST delivered data).
    The 'self' link references this rest object, including any specified query criteria

reportedTime.description: The most recent reported time among all the sub-stations (display, camera, rp) at this Station

id.description: the resource identifier; the station id (an IP address)

cameraStation.description: Information for the Camera Station, if any

displayStation.description: Information for the Display Station, if any

rpStation.description: Information for the Radar Processing (RP) Station, if any

totalTime.description: total number of hours the PCRP has been on. Available with expand=detail

transmitTime.description: total number of hours the radar has transmitted. Available with expand=detail

latitude.description: [-90 to +90]: Latitude of the object (Decimal Degrees, North Positive/South Negative)

longitude.description: [-180 to +180]: Longitude of the object (Decimal Degrees, East Positive/West Negative)

altitude.description: Height of the object above sea level (meters)

lastReported.description:
Date and time of the last received report.
    Example Value: 2019-03-14T14:55:00Z specifies a year-month-day followed by 24-hour hours:minutes:seconds in GMT time

secondsSinceLastReport.description: How long ago the last report was received in seconds
